files.help: Since version 1.2w, `gmrun` can be compiled with `FOLLOW_XDG_SPEC` flag, then _${HOME}/.gmrunrc_ may be moved to _${XDG_CONFIG_HOME}/gmrunrc_.
Since version 1.2w, `gmrun` can be compiled with `FOLLOW_XDG_SPEC` flag, then _${HOME}/.gmrun_history_ may be moved to _${XDG_DATA_HOME}/gmrun_history_.
